description:
EIM GUI: Cross-Platform ESP-IDF Installation Manager


What's Changed
- fix(linux): prevent WebKitGTK DMA-BUF crash on Nvidia + Wayland (EIM-500) by @OmerFarukOruc in #428
- EIM-499: Add workflow to automate PR link comments on Jira by @alirana01 in #427
- EIM-191 added gui test execution to the build pipeline by @Hahihula in #417
- fix: use /etc/os-release for distro-based package manager detection (EIM-495) by @OmerFarukOruc in #420
- EIM-493 updated the version management page of the documentation by @Hahihula in #445
- EIM-497: Replace which with command -v to fix panic on minimal Linux distros by @alirana01 in #422
- UI: Polish Chinese UI text by @Shen7436 in #426
- adding workflow for automatically closing empty issues by @Hahihula in #447
- EIM-512 switched the output from the run command to streamig by @Hahihula in #452
- Python sanity check improvements by @alirana01 in #424
- EIM-452: debug archives purging workflow by @alirana01 in #415
- EIM-536 fixed the eim remove and eim purge command for case the eim is installed from existing local repository or imported by @Hahihula in #469
- EIM-506: Fix missing install prerequisites button by @Hahihula in #457
- updated documentation about the supported python version by @Hahihula in #456
- EIM-535 enabled selecting idf based on idf path by @Hahihula in #468
New Contributors
- @OmerFarukOruc made their first contribution in #428
Full Changelog: v0.8.0...v0.8.1
